// Transition format: fromStateId toStateId readCHar writeChar moveDirection
// The Character '~' is the catchall character
TRANSITION:
	0 1 : : RIGHT
	0 2 = = RIGHT
	0 3 ; ; RIGHT
	0 4 - - RIGHT
	4 5 ( ( RIGHT
	1 6 ) ) RIGHT
